omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
select distinct
			(select PatientId from omop_staging.rtds_1_demographics d where d.PatientSer = dc.PatientSer limit 1) as NhsNumber,
			DateStamp
		from omop_staging.RTDS_5_Diagnosis_Course dc
		where dc.DiagnosisCode like 'Decision%'
		and NhsNumber is not null
		and regexp_matches(NhsNumber, '\d{10}');

omopColumns.name: observation_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `4134859`. Decision to perform date

omopColumns.name: observation_date
omopColumns.query:
select distinct
			(select PatientId from omop_staging.rtds_1_demographics d where d.PatientSer = dc.PatientSer limit 1) as NhsNumber,
			DateStamp
		from omop_staging.RTDS_5_Diagnosis_Course dc
		where dc.DiagnosisCode like 'Decision%'
		and NhsNumber is not null
		and regexp_matches(NhsNumber, '\d{10}');

omopColumns.name: observation_datetime
omopColumns.operation_description: Combines a date with a time of day.
omopColumns.query:
select distinct
			(select PatientId from omop_staging.rtds_1_demographics d where d.PatientSer = dc.PatientSer limit 1) as NhsNumber,
			DateStamp
		from omop_staging.RTDS_5_Diagnosis_Course dc
		where dc.DiagnosisCode like 'Decision%'
		and NhsNumber is not null
		and regexp_matches(NhsNumber, '\d{10}');

omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `32818`. EHR administration record
